item.title: Find Picture String
item.author: Author
item.description: A nice option to the find command that comes in handy is the picture string. I like to use it to find error messages in logs for my normal daily health checks. There are several characters types to choose from. While in the SYSLOG or any output you can enter these command examples to find errors. Example: Go into the SYSLOG and max to bottom of log This example will find any errors starting with the EQQ characters followed by any 4 characters and ending with a letter E going backwards in the SYSLOG.
